official_title: Communicating About Nicotine and Differential Risks of Tobacco Products in Priority Populations
inclusion_criteria:
* Age 21+ years
* Current smoker (self-report as having smoked 100 cigarettes in their lifetime and currently smoking on 27+ days out of past 30, expired breath carbon monoxide [CO] â‰¥6ppm to assess regular smoking)
* Can speak, read, and write in English
* Available for period of study
* Willing to try novel research cigarettes
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 21 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Pregnancy or lactation
* Member of the same household as a study subject
* Unwilling to use research cigarettes as part of the trial
